item.title: My busy day!
item.description: Hey team, how’s the feels? Are we safe, happy, and loved? Cool, cool! Me?! You guys - so sweet of you to ask! Feeling the love and loving it! So, I don’t want to sound dramatic, but, God!, it’s sometimes hard to carry the weight of this much awesome. I was trying to collaborate with one of my worker bees this morning, and no matter how many times we went over and over the same thing, he just would not collaborate as he was told.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Like the opera ladies sings, I’m all about “me me me me me”. I’ve been working at Cretin Solutions for, I don’t know, longer than I can remember actually. They’ve enjoyed every minute of me.

item.title: Ponzi Promise Pyramid
item.description: Check out a master… … promises are just like cash, only way more valuable. If there’s one thing the boss loves, it’s the smell of new money - or “opportunity” as he cutely says. Darlings, providence from heaven, I swear.

item.title: Conducting my orchestra
item.description: Today’s piece, my fans, is called “Puppets on a string”. I love love love being the boss of all them players…
